name: CLEAR FLOOR 2-Post Lift
description: The Clear Floor 2-Post Lifts are widely used in auto and repairs shops. The hydraulic hose and equalization cables run across the top of the lift through a metal bar (conduit) that conects both columns in the overhead lift.

name: FLOOR PLATE 2-Post Lift
description: The Floor Plate 2-Post parking Lift is an industry leader. The hydraulic hose and equalization cables run across the floor and are covered by a beveled diamond-plate, steel floor plate, approximately 1-inch tall in the baseplate lift. The baseplate lift has a locking mechanism that is operated with the dual point release system.

name: Single Post Lift
description: Simple and space saving, the Single Post Lift features a hydraulic chain drive, ensuring stability while it lifts and falls as well as it's own movable wheels, making it flexible and conveneint to use.
